geo.name: nn.askForGPS
geo.code:
<script>
log('code ran... waiting for permission...')

nn.askForGPS((data) => {
  log(`We've got data! ${data.lat}, ${data.lng}`)
})
  
</script>
geo.text: This example uses the nn library's askForGPS method. Behind the scenes it uses the Web's Geolocation API. NOTE: clicking on "open in netnet" won't work properly for this example (because on netnet you'll need to load the nn library in a script tag first).
